hero.name: Fu Hangkang (Eyre)
hero.subtitle: A young person passionate about AI technology
hero.university: Hunan University 2024 - Computer Science and Technology (AI Class)
hero.description: A strategic, systematic thinking, and highly pragmatic opportunist.
hero.intro: An AI-native young person who loves exploring unknown fields, collecting and organizing useful knowledge, and sharing it. Continuously discovering and implementing problems that can be accelerated by AI, aspiring to become an excellent agent engineer.
hero.quote: Dots become lines when the time clicks.
hero.quoteDesc: Many things I learn are individual dots. I may not know how to use them now, nor can I predict if they'll be useful. But when the time comes that these dots become relevant, I'll connect them into a line.
hero.mobileTip: Tip: For the full and rich motion experience, please visit on PC

about.title: About Me
about.trait1: Love dreaming, emotionally sensitive, thoughtful, with diverse interests
about.trait2: Love everything that touches the heart
about.doing1: Expanding horizons, observing carefully, connecting broadly
about.doing2: Open sourcing myself, Building in Public
about.doing5: Learning to become a reliable IP
about.goodAt1: Collecting data, organizing patterns, sharing insights
about.goodAt2: Continuous learning, thoughtful thinking, quick starting
about.goodAt3: Observing life and the world, discovering creativity
about.goodAt4: Starting immediately, iterating quickly with small steps
about.dream1: First, become the brain that can design AI workflows for companies of hundreds or even thousands of people,
about.dream2: Then personally engage and disrupt entire industries with the workflows I designed.

skills.title: My Life & Pursuits
skills.hobby1: Photography, video editing, photo editing (beginner but sufficient~)
skills.hobby2: Exploring restaurants, eating good food (may develop into cooking later)
skills.hobby4: Listening to music, tuning audio, singing (just for fun~)
skills.hobby5: Reading, such as literature, science, logic, psychology, life philosophy, etc.
skills.pursuit1Desc: What could be more important than living a happy and fulfilling life? Develop hobbies, have a sense of life style, and make yourself happy and fulfilled.
skills.pursuit2Desc: Experience more of life, experience more emotions, meet more people, understand them, and enrich my cognitive world. Stroke by stroke, color by color, paint this life canvas with richer, brighter, and more fulfilling colors.
skills.pursuit3Title: Be who you needed when you were younger
skills.pursuit3Desc: Those who have been rained on want to hold an umbrella for others.
skills.milestone1: Gained product awareness enlightenment, learned to view problems from a Founder's perspective, comprehensive capability training
skills.milestone2: Participated in Huawei Cloud ASTRO and won first prize
skills.milestone3: Participated in Chinese Collegiate Computing Competition and won provincial first & national second prize
skills.milestone4: Participated in HNU CTF and won first prize
skills.milestone5: Conducted AI training for a company with annual revenue of 500 million, earned first bucket of gold
skills.milestone6: Full-stack development, deployment, and operation of multi-tenant order management system
skills.milestone7: Took on multiple SaaS websites outsourcing projects

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Looking forward to communicating with you and doing something interesting together
contact.life1: I expect our communication to be casual, relaxed, natural, and authentic.
contact.life2: You can freely share any ordinary daily life, shining moments, emotional bits, or unique insights.
contact.life3: I will be a patient listener and lend a helping hand when you need it.
contact.workTip1: Direct and clear: Phone/online meeting/face-to-face > text message; text messages should state the purpose directly, no need for 'Are you there?' preamble.
contact.workTip2: Document first: Key points and documents are the most efficient communication tools; they don't need to be neat and formal, just convey the information you think is necessary.
contact.workTip3: Clarify doubts: Please allow me to ask questions about things I don't understand at any time; you can also ask me questions at any time to ensure our thinking is clear.
contact.workTip4: Honest feedback: If you find any mistakes or improprieties on my part, please point them out; if you can provide improvement suggestions, I would be very grateful.
